functional_jobs.job_statement: When I want to sign up for events, I want to complete the sign-up process smoothly, so I can participate in the events I’m interested in.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Using the website to sign up for events.
functional_jobs.pain_points: Occasionally, the sign-up process does not complete, causing frustration and leading to abandonment.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A seamless sign-up experience that allows me to register for events without issues.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: I can successfully sign up for events without encountering errors.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When I’m preparing to attend an event, I want to feel informed and ready, so I can confidently engage with other attendees.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: Looking up attendees in the directory to learn about them.
emotional_jobs.pain_points: Not knowing attendees can lead to anxiety about social interactions at events.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A sense of preparedness and confidence when meeting new people.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: I feel comfortable and knowledgeable about who I might meet at events.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I attend events, I want to be perceived as knowledgeable and engaged, so I can build connections with others.
social_jobs.current_solution: Using the website to research attendees and events.
social_jobs.pain_points: Lack of information about attendees can make me feel unprepared and less confident.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: A positive social standing among peers, where I am seen as informed and approachable.
social_jobs.success_criteria: I can initiate conversations easily and feel included in discussions.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I want to find event details quickly, I want to access information easily, so I can make timely decisions about attending.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Checking the events calendar on the website.
supporting_jobs.pain_points: Navigating the website can sometimes be cumbersome or confusing.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: Quick and easy access to event information without unnecessary delays.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: I can find event details within a few clicks and without frustration.
